name: Purple Sweet Potato Ice Cream
description: This vegan purple sweet potato ice cream is studded with chunks of fresh pineapple and toasted pecans. It is perfectly sweet and creamy, without all the fat of traditional ice cream.
recipeIngredient: 1 lb. Purple sweet potatoes (peeled and cut into cubes)

recipeInstructions.text: Place sweet potatoes in a medium saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a simmer and cook for 20 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Place sweet potatoes in a medium saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a simmer and cook for 20 minutes or until potatoes are tender.

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, combine the sweet potatoes, almond milk, sugar, maple syrup, vanilla, lime juice, and tequila. Process until smooth. The mixture should have the thickness of a heavy cream.
recipeInstructions.name: In a blender, combine the sweet potatoes, almond milk, sugar, maple syrup, vanilla, lime juice, and tequila. Process until smooth. The mixture should have the thickness of a heavy cream.

recipeInstructions.text: Chill for at least an hour in the refrigerator, then pour into your ice cream maker according to the manufacturer’s instructions.
recipeInstructions.name: Chill for at least an hour in the refrigerator, then pour into your ice cream maker according to the manufacturer’s instructions.

recipeInstructions.text: You can mix in the pecans and pineapple in to the ice cream after the machine has finished spinning or you can add them to the machine when the ice cream is about to be done.
recipeInstructions.name: You can mix in the pecans and pineapple in to the ice cream after the machine has finished spinning or you can add them to the machine when the ice cream is about to be done.

recipeInstructions.text: Eat right away or freeze up to 5 hours to let the ice cream harden a bit.
recipeInstructions.name: Eat right away or freeze up to 5 hours to let the ice cream harden a bit.

keywords: dairy free ice cream, homemade vegan ice cream, purple sweet potato ice cream, vegan sweet potato ice cream
